price: Dia-lah yang membentuk kamu dalam rahim sebagaimana dikehendaki-Nya.  Tak ada tuhan (yang berhak disembah) melainkan Dia, Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَوِّرُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuṣawwirukum fī al-arḥāmi kayfa yashāu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
